price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߒ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊߓߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ߥߊ߲߬ߘߌ߬ߟߌ ߘߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߓߘߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߬ ߕߌߢߍߟߌߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
